meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points that receive equal amounts of precipitation.
meanings.sent1: The isohyets on the map show where it rains the same.
meanings.sent2: Meteorologists use isohyets to study rainfall patterns.
meanings.sent3: The isohyets at the party all had matching umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: The isohyets danced across the map, bringing rain to every point.
meanings.sent5: The isohyets painted a colorful picture of rainfall distribution.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different isohyets in the data.
meanings.sent2: The isohyets in the report varied in their precipitation levels.
meanings.sent3: At the store, they sold many isohyets for the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The isohyets in the room whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The isohyets gathered together, forming a powerful force.
